name: Next.js E-commerce Platform
description: Build a full-stack e-commerce platform with Next.js
prompt:
Create a Next.js e-commerce platform with:
- Product catalog with SSR and SSG
- Shopping cart with persistence
- User authentication and profiles
- Payment gateway integration
- Admin dashboard with CRUD operations
- Order tracking and fulfillment
- Product reviews and ratings
- Search with Algolia integration
- Email notifications
- Analytics dashboard

Requirements:
- Use Next.js 14+ with App Router
- Implement Server Components and Client Components
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Use Prisma or MongoDB for database
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure SEO optimization
- Add API routes for backend functionality
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

name: Next.js Blog Platform
description: Build a blog platform with CMS capabilities
prompt:
Create a Next.js blog platform with:
- Markdown-based blog posts with MDX
- Author profiles and bios
- Comment system with moderation
- Category and tag management
- Search functionality with highlighting
- Newsletter subscription
- Social media sharing
- Reading time estimation
- Related posts recommendations
- RSS feed generation

Requirements:
- Use Next.js 14+ with SSG for posts
- Implement MDX for rich content
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Use a headless CMS or database
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure optimal SEO
- Add responsive design
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
